title: [Large-scale] Remote Laboratory Class Design: Blended Learning-based Expert Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic chemical laboratory knowledge and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Customized course for pre-service/in-service teachers to strengthen science education capabilities within corporate settings.

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more remote laboratory lesson modules by applying the BLEND model.
Learners can develop an integrated operational plan for experimental procedure simulations, data analysis, and collaborative assessment systems in blended learning environments.
Learners can develop two or more interaction strategies between learners and instructors using real-time video conferencing tools and LMS.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
